I'm having the exact same issue. For testing purposes I disabled the PDT and noticed that eclipse "hangs" a bit even without the PDT. With PDT this hang takes up ages, but eventually it continues running.

I read a post in the newsgroups (cant find the link now) which mentions that having the navigator in a "not minimized" state prevents the lockup.

I always have minimized all views, so I resetted the perspective and restarted. The lockup is gone :S. Certainly this is not the solution, neither I know if this is a standard behaviour.
I believe this is the same as bug 204977
Like Paulius mentioned, this is the same as bug 204977 and it occurs on linux as well.
